tourBios.carHigh:
2012: Made his PGA TOUR debut, at the Mayakoba Golf Classic in Mexico. Shot rounds of 72-75 to miss the cut at El Camaleon GC. 

2008: Made his lone Web.com Tour appearance, missing the cut at the Ford Wayne Gretzky Classic after a pair of 74s in Canada.

tourBios.exmtStatus: Exempt - Finished 11-45 at 2015 Web.com Tour Qualifying Tournament (subject to second reshuffle)
tourBios.intlVics: (1): 2008 La Loma San Luis Potosi Open [Mex].
tourBios.carHigh:
Has played the Gateway, NGA and Spanos Tours.

2014: Finished T121 at the Web.com Tour Qualifying Tournament in December...In nine PGA TOUR Canada starts, made five cuts, with his best finish coming in his last appearance, a T8 at the Cape Breton Classic. Finished 71st on the Order of Merit...Also made nine cuts on Latinoamérica, which led to six cuts made, two top-25s and a top finish of T4 at the Lexus Peru Open in November. Was 68th on the Tour's Order of Merit.

2013: Played in 13 Latinoamérica events, making six cuts. His best finish, a T15, came at the season-ending Argentine Open.

2008: First Web.com Tour start at the Ford Wayne Gretzky Classic resulted in missed cut...Won the La Loma San Luis Poyosi Open
tourBios.otherCarHigh: Won the 1998 Southwest Amateur, with his dad as his caddie.
tourBios.personal: Attended Flintridge Prep in La Canada, Calif...Favorites include Texas Longhorns and Los Angeles Kings, "Man vs. Wild" and "Naked and Afraid." Also likes "The Shawshank Redemption" and "Borat" and the book The Da Vinci Code. Is a big fan of tennis Roger Federer...Los Angeles Clippers' Coach Doc Rivers is a close friend who he plays golf with often...Has attended three Super Bowls...Would like to trade places with Richard Branson for a day...Bucket list includes learning how to surf and joining a beer hockey team...First-tee intro song would be "Demon" by Imagine Dragons.

dyn.dynResults: His best finish on the Web.com Tour in 2016 is T38th at the Club Colombia Championship Presented by Claro.
dyn.dynStats: He ranks 34th in Driving Distance on the Web.com Tour.
